"Are you sure it'll be all right?" Phoenix asks, worried.  The 
communication with Megatron has reminded her of all the things the 
Rogues have said in her hearing about Megatron.  They didn't paint a 
very pretty picture.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> They approach the Pred base and Flicker opens a comm
> link.
> 
> Flicker:  Greetings mighty Megatron great leader of
> the Predicons.  I am Flicker, myself and my companion
> request an audience with your person.
> 
> He hoped that the slag he had just spit out gave him a
> good first impression, bacause he had no intention of
> talking like that  whenever Megatron came into the
> room, no matter how much he admired the guy.
